name: United Legions Waystation Synchronization
requirement: Travel to Drizzlewood Coast to unlock.

levels.name: Electromagical Pulse
levels.description: Interact with United Legions Waystations in Drizzlewood Coast, and obtain an Ash Legion Electromagical Pulse special action skill.
levels.instruction: You can now interact with United Legions Waystations in the Drizzlewood Coast and obtain the Ash Legion EMP special action skill.

levels.name: Remote Charge
levels.description: Adds an Iron Legion Remote Charge special action skill to the United Legions Waystation options.
levels.instruction: You can now select the Iron Legion Remote Charge special action skill from United Legions Waystations.

levels.name: Portable Waystation
levels.description: Use one-time consumables to construct portable waystations anywhere in the open world.
levels.instruction: You can now purchase consumables from United Legions Waystations that will deploy a portable waystation at your location.

levels.name: Iron Legion Medizooka
levels.description: Adds the Medizooka special action ability to United Legions waystation options.
levels.instruction: You can now select the Medizooka special action ability from United Legions waystations.

levels.name: Ash Legion Mount Stealth
levels.description: Master using Ash Legion tech to allow the use of stealth when mounted.
levels.instruction: The Ash Legion has trained you to apply stealth to your mount, allowing you to avoid combat.

levels.name: United Legions Waystation Mastery
levels.description: Master usage of United Legions waystations by upgrading associated abilities.
levels.instruction: Abilities from United Legions waystations are now more powerful.
